result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deonte Daniel Simmons

records.addlTxt:
Clerk:  Amy. 
Case called:  9:05 a.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF1168, 22CF1171, 22CF1195.
State appears by ADA Alex Lech for ADA Coonen. 
Defendant appears in custody from MCJ, pro se. 

Date and time set for preliminary hearing in 22CF1195; VRCW. 
ADA Lech notes subpoena was generated and is waiting to confirm with staff if Subpoena was sent to officer.
COURT questions deft re: appointment of counsel; Defendant states he has been waiting since September on 22CF1168, 22CF1171.
Court notes SPD is still looking for counsel and report filed.  
Court advises right of counsel.  Defendant wants to have preliminary hearing today. 
ADA Lech states subpoena was sent but some confusion with EMPD so Officer is not here today. 
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits on all matters. 

COURT sets PH 10/26/22 at 10:00 a.m., Branch 5. 

Adj:  9:13 a.m. 

cc: Branch 5.
Review hearing on October 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:00 pm. 
INCLUDES: 22CF1168, 22CF1171 & 22CF1195.

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes counsel has not yet been appointed. 
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing in 22CF1168 & 22CF1171.
Prelim is currently set for 10/19/2022 @ 9am, Branch 4 in case 22CF1195. Deft. wishes to proceed to prelim. Prelim will be held w/in time limits in 22CF1195. 

Adj: 1:13 pm.
Review hearing on October 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:01 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CF1168 7 22CF1171.

Deft appears via phone, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes counsel has not yet been appointed. 
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing. 
Prelim set for 10/12/2022 to be removed from calendar.
Review set for 10/14/2022 at 1:00 pm in Courtroom B. 

Adj: 1:02 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Deonte Daniel Simmons
Current: 1700 Jefferson Street, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 10-06-2022)
Prior: 6300 Birch Street #34, Weston, WI 54476

Review hearing on October 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on October 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Calendar call on October 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

No contact with victim(s): K.R.L. or Jim's bar in Weston, WI. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances unless prescribed and taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:11 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.

COURT ORDERS: $3,000.00 signature bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): K.R.L., Jims bar in Weston, WI. 
- No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances unless prescribed and taken as prescribed.  
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
RH: 10/7/22 @ 1:00 p.m. Courtroom B.
PH: 10/12/22 @ 9:00 a.m. Br. 3. 
CC: 10/27/22 @ 1:00 p.m. 

Adjourned: 2:16 p.m.
